meanings.definition: A mechanical device that transmits power from an engine to the wheels of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The gearbox in the car helps the engine power the wheels.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the gearbox in the truck to ensure smooth driving.
meanings.sent3: When the gearbox in the old car broke, it made a funny noise like a squeaky toy.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a gearbox, smoothly transferring thoughts into actions.
meanings.sent5: The gearbox, like a conductor, orchestrates the movement of power in the vehicle.

meanings.definition: The system of gears in a vehicle that allows for different speeds and torque.
meanings.sent1: The gearbox of the bike lets you change speeds easily.
meanings.sent2: He studied the gearbox of the tractor to understand its functions better.
meanings.sent3: The gearbox of the car seemed to have a mind of its own, shifting gears unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: In life, we all have our own gearbox, adjusting to the twists and turns along the way.
meanings.sent5: The gearbox hummed softly, a symphony of mechanical harmony in the vehicle.
